column4: can anyone explain howcome i have SMP while having one processor? (uname output: Linux 2.6.17-10-generic #2 SMP Fri Oct 13 18:45:35 UTC 2006 i686 GNU/Linux)
cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep processor output: processor : 0 model name : Intel(R) Pentium(R) M processor 1.70GHz
it won't run that in SMP mode, don't worry
